files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Provides functions for various search operations including word searches, phrase searches, case sensitivity options, verse range searches, and gematrical value calculations.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and returns verses containing the search word. Supports case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; default is False.

functions.name: search_word_group

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The exact phrase to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; default is False.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
